special_abilities.name: Innate Spellcasting (Psionics).
descriptions: The githyanki's innate spellcasting ability is Intelligence. It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no components:

descriptions.raw: At will: mage hand (the hand is invisible)
descriptions.hyperlinked: At will: mage hand (the hand is invisible)

descriptions.raw: 3/day each: jump, misty step, nondetection (self only)
descriptions.hyperlinked: 3/day each: jump, misty step, nondetection (self only)

actions.name: Multiattack.
descriptions: The githyanki makes two greatsword attacks.

actions.name: Greatsword.
descriptions: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 9 (2d6 + 2) slashing damage plus 7 (2d6) psychic damage.
